ASigma sees frequent use in both PVE and PVP and can single-handedly carry new accounts deep into the game with how many roles she covers as a unit.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ASigma’s tower provides her a strong self-regeneration effect that gives her staying power as a frontline unit, and when destroyed throws her into a berserk state, granting powerful offensive self-buffs. She also boasts the highest ultimate skill multiplier in the game. All these combine to create a self-healing frontline tank with more damage capacity than the majority of this game’s dedicated damage dealers.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"PVE Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ASigma’s unique combination of frontline tankiness and obscene damage output make her an premier PVE unit, as she fills both the frontline tank and the damage dealer roles on the team. As such, she is one of the premier damage carries, outperformed only by Eve Meitner.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"ASigma is the best carry by far when it comes to progressing general story content. ASigma’s kit, coupled with her absurd base stats, combine to create a stat stick monster who can rapidly overwhelm her enemies when left unchecked.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"While ASigma isn’t exactly hard to use (unga bunga smash), her tower introduces a surprising amount of depth to her gameplay. The tower can be deployed in such a way that it is more/ less susceptible to being destroyed, granting you some degree of control over ASigma’s berserk mode timing. The tower can also be positioned as a deterrent to prevent your opponents from deploying near it, lest they risk triggering ASigma’s berserk mode.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Naturally, ASigma’s position as a melee-range damage dealer exposes her to a ton of risk. As such, she performs best when used in comps built around her. ASigma performs best in aggressive rush comps that take full advantage of her strengths as a damage dealer - frontline hybrid to overwhelm the enemy team before they can properly set up on their side of the field.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"There are a number of ways to consistently counter ASigma and mitigate her impact:","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Dedicated anti-striker damage dealers","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": ASigma typically runs damage gear (i.e. Maze CDR), so she only has her innate tankiness and her team to keep her alive.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Stall comps","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": Stall comps are the best way to weather ASigma’s early game onslaught and naturally scale well as the game progresses. ASigma comps, and rush comps in general, drop off considerably the longer matches go on.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Buff removal","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":": ASigma’s immortality buff is removable. description.description: A hybrid attacker that gets stronger when her main body is on the battlefield.

introduction.introduction:
시그마는 무지 강력한 펀치와 멋지고 화려한 빔으로 적을 제압하는 스트라이커야! 
안녕! 난 시그마! 여기에 자기소개를 적으면 되는 거지? 시그마는 아빠가 만든 굉장한 딸이야. 그리고 풀파워를 사용할 수 있는 지금은 굉장히 세고 멋진 딸이라구.
테라브레인의 출력에는 한계가 없어! 엄청나게 많은 일을 처리하도록 만들어져서 전력공급만 있으면 얼마든지 강해질 수 있단 말씀! 
...초기형 모델만 리미트를 고려하지 않고 만들어져서 그런 거라고? 아, 미안! 내 기능 설명서를 잠깐 살펴봤어. 어쨌든 시그마는 지금 존재하는 테라브레인 친구들 중에서도 가장 대책없이 강하대! 자기소개 끝! 이제 아빠랑 놀아달라고 하러 가야지.

pve.notes: Can be substituted for Swift CDR relics with Skill Haste latents

pvp.notes: Can be substituted for Swift CDR relics with Skill Haste latents

baseDescription.baseDescription: Attack the nearby enemy with her gauntlets, dealing AOE Damage.

Deploys together with Terrabrain. While Terrabrain is on the field, all Sigma attacks except for Ultimate will unleash additional attacks, and Sigma gains additional effects. Terrabrain cannot receive healing, buffs, or debuffs and it gets destroyed after receiving 15 hits regardless of damage.

Terrabrain's additional effects: ATK+25%, HP Recovery per sec+3%

※All Allies including Sigma gain Role DISADV DMG Res+100%

level5.level5: When Terrabrain gets destroyed, Sigma enters the runaway state and her skills become sealed for 15 seconds. She also gains hitstun immunity, debuff immunity, immortality, +100% ATK, and +100% ASPD for the duration of the skill seal. (Unleash additional attacks during runaway state)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Approaches the target in front then repeatedly strike them with the gauntlet, dealing AoE damage. Gain immunity to hitstun from Special or lower skills for 8s after casting.

level5.level5: Every additional attack reduces the cooldown of the Special skill by 1s

baseDescription.baseDescription: Unleashes the full power of Terrabrain and deals AoE damage to enemies in front. Targets outside of 1300 reach do not receive damage, and damaged targets' skills become sealed for 10 seconds (Bosses excluded).

level5.level5: For 18 seconds after casting the skill, Additional attacks always CRIT. Ultimate cooldown -12s when Sigma enters the runaway state.
